channel.title: Update text for "Open Consultation on all proposed changes"
channel.description:
Hello
I noticed at http://iatistandard.org/201/upgrades/#open-consultation-on-all-proposed-changes:
> If you wish to discuss an idea before submitting a proposal you may wish to consult the IATI Technical Mailing List first.
I understand that this mailing list is now closed, replaced by this forum. Therefore, it could be useful to update this guidance text.

item.title: Update text for "Open Consultation on all proposed changes"
item.dc:creator: dalepotter
item.description:
Thanks Steven, great spot - @rory_scott is working on fixing this today, as well as checking and correcting for any other references to the IATI Technical Mailing List.

Read full topic
item.source: Update text for "Open Consultation on all proposed changes"

item.title: Update text for "Open Consultation on all proposed changes"
item.dc:creator: stevieflow
item.description:
Hello

I noticed at
http://iatistandard.org/201/upgrades/#open-consultation-on-all-proposed-changes:

If you wish to discuss an idea before submitting a proposal you may wish to consult the IATI Technical Mailing List first.

I understand that this mailing list is now closed, replaced by this forum. Therefore, it could be useful to update this guidance text.

Read full topic
